description:
Domon, Yanagi, and Fuko try to help Recca out of his depression over his loss to Tokiya. But a trip to an amusement park turns deadly when Tokiya challenges Recca once more.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagami no Meikyuu Kesshi no Kaen!!
Labyrinth of Mirrors: The Flame of Death!!
鏡の迷宮 決死の火炎!!
